item.description:
Hello Ex-Midwesterners it's that time of year SUPERBOWL SUNDAY!! Since we had so much fun last year watching the Superbowl together we decided to make this a annual tradition.

On Sunday February 7th we will have the Ex-Midwest 2nd Annual Superbowl Party this time traditional superbowl games and trivia will be added to make things a little more interesting. The location and exact time will be updated but expect it to begin between 5-5:30 P.M.. As far as the location it will be either one of two places, The Fours right by North Station or The Tavern right down the street from Central Redline T Stop.

Stay tuned for more information!
item.name: 2nd Annual Ex-Midwest Superbowl Party
